about_the_game:
Twin Stick Heroes 2 the ultimate local multiplayer experience! Choose from a diverse cast of heroes, and engage in epic battles across a galaxy of exotic planets. This time with new gameplay options an array of new heroes to master, and balance improvements for fair and thrilling combat. Twin Stick Heroes 2 is the sequel you've been waiting for. Are you ready to prove your skills and conquer the cosmos?
Join the fight today!



WELCOME TO TRUE TWIN STICK COMBAT
At its core Twin Stick Heroes 2 is a hilarious and intense 1-4 player party game. The "heroes" cater towards very different playstyles, learning which one suites you best is key. Combat can seem wild and unpredictable with everchanging items and stages, but
mastering your hero will carry you through to the end.



CHOOSE YOUR HERO
  • A VIBRANT CAST OF 27 HEROS! Every hero in the game has specific strengths and weaknesses, learning to master their weapon and abilities
    is key to victory.

  • MASTERY SYSTEM! Play against your friends to unlock new stages and heroes', or go it alone against bosses and the 100 man melee to unlock their mastery skin and furnish your home

  • ITEMS ARE COMING OUT OF MY EARS! Make use of the weird items and wield abilities never before seen, such as the timeline changing
    save state, or the black hole which is so powerful it may eat everyone on stage!

  • WATCH THE SKIES! A new weather mode can be enabled to unleash even more havoc in the match! Don't let the wind blow you away, and make sure to keep your eyes to the sky and nab items with the item shower.


Say hello to a new and improved cast of "heroes". Take on your foes as the otherworldly Hunam, showcasing inhuman sniping skills. Defend your position like a pro with the dependable Camper, or dispense unrelenting justice as the battle-hardened Veteran. Or pull out all the stops with the evil mind manipulator himself Dr Brain and his sinister goons!



A TRUE PIXEL ART EXPERIENCE
Art was inspired from the likes of older snes games such as Earthbound and FZERO, mixed with a healthy dose of Saturday morning cartoons such as Beavis and Butthead and King of the Hill.

Fight on the labyrinthine surface of Gord City, whose asphalt paved roads and buildings make for a unique experience, or journey across the coliseum which is littered with the megalithic remains of a once mighty civilization.



SINGLE PLAYER!
  • Defeat evil bosses which vary from a fungal infection to a gangster mob

  • Hero masteries that unlock costumes which carry over into multiplayer

  • Unlock new furniture for your home in the single player mode

  • Take on the wild and crazed hoards in the 100 man melee



KEY FEATURES
  • local multiplayer, and online multiplayer with Steam remote play

  • A new and improved single player experience

  • 27 Heroes to choose from

  • Mastery system and tons of unlocks to discover

  • Items galore

  • Tons of handcrafted stages to fight on

  • Cartoony snes inspired pixel art

short_description: Fight, deceive, and blow up your friends in weird and perilous battlefields. Its like if Towerfall and Enter the Gungeon were mixed together, with a large dose of silliness inspired by Duck Game.
